Summary: One triangle with 3 red lights in the back . 3 lights on the bottom . 1 circle fire ball stationary.
divs: sighting detailskenny pfeifer , is on this case - from mufon . 11 20 pm . i went out side to smoke a cigarette. then i noticed again stationary 1\2 of a mile north from my drive way . there was a huge orange ball ! it was flashing a fire like color , twinkling star like . i went back in side and told my mother linda susan beyer , she came out side . as soon as i walked out side a huge at least 3 foot ball fields long a triangle shape craft stationary 1\2 of a mile north at green branch park in pittsgrove. it was rotating & stationary . as i proceeded to take a picture my cam area would not turn on . i ran back in the house to check it . i put new batteries in it . ran back out side as my mother linda beyer watch in shock . i ran north to the rode and try ed to take a picture , my [cms\tg\pd] camera the battery's drained as soon as i hit click . i could not get a shot of this object . i am really pissed because this is kind of ufo i have never seen . it stayed there over the tree lines then vanished . the woods in front of me lit up like the color of the sun . me and my mom got in the car and tried our best to get a picture of this thing . the dam gates of the park were locked . then about 45 minutes later i said [cms\tg\pd] it ! i went in my house and was watching angels & demons a down load copy i got from torrentz.com . i looked out side again through my window this triangle thing . shot straight up in the air so fast like a bullet ! our phone lines were not working , a loud humbling noise , we were hearing out side . i ran to get my dads cell phone to call kenny pfeifer when i first seen it . but my dads cell phone was dead . 2 cars went by and stoped and i know they seen this thing ! i do not understand why its always at green branch park ? on upper neck r.d pittsgrove n.j 08318 . i will reassure you these are not our air !crafts ! i do have new pictures . of some really messed up scary [cms\tg\pd] on my cam 7 mega pixels . i will send some pictures soon . i am not going to say on here what it is , for certain reasons somebody needs to get a crew down here and stake this place out . i am not kidden or playing games its bothering me . that people are so [cms\tg\pd] ignorant to turn there heads and say no we don't see nothing . excuse me for my language but there's heavy ufo crap around here \ paranormal activity . it always seems to be at 10:30 to 12 am every few days . my computer is near my window that's y i see allot at night
